dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2776389H] Site design /DMA violation
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. 

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:abuse@ev1servers.net] 
Sent: Monday, January 29, 2007 8:33 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2776389H] Site design /DMA violation

==== Forwarded Ticket ====

Added by system at Monday, Jan 29 2007 06:59 pm

From: Christopher Meinck <chris@everythingtreo.com>
Subject: Site design /DMA violation
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Message-id: <5C211ADA-9CD3-4585-B82D-093107DCFD81@everythingtreo.com>
MIME-version: 1.0 (Apple Message framework v752.2)

MIME element (text/plain)
Hi- 
I'm the owner of Smart Phone Resource, Inc and the site Everything   
iPhone located at 
http://www.everythingiphone.com. It has come to my attention that one   
of the sites 
you are hosting has violated my copyrights. The offending party has   
completely "scraped" 
the design from my site which is in clear violation of the Digital   
Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA). 
I reported this to their last host and they evidently moved to   
hosting with The Planet. The user
hasn't even bothered to removed the footer. 
 
The site in question is: http://piratebayagency.com/ 
 
I have contacted the site owner and have yet to hear back. I would   
ask for your assistance
in having this design removed ASAP. 
 
Thank you for your time. If you should have any questions, please do   
not hesitate to contact
me at 516-783-3710. 
 
Thanks! 
Regards,
Christopher 
 
-----------------------------------------------
Christopher Meinck
chris@everythingtreo.com
-----------------------------------------------

http://www.everythingtreo.com
